name: Corporate copying
description:
Controls:

WASD -> Movement

Spacebar -> Interact

Mouse cursor -> Look direction (No functionality)

 

Overview:

On the edge of being fired, if your boss catches you away from your desk you will lose your job - but in order to do your job you need to use the photocopier in the middle of the room! 

Get all your photocopying for the day done and make it back to your desk in order to progress.

My submission for VimJam2 was rather heavily inspired by an old Flash game from Stickpage, 'The Classroom'. I fondly remembered the quasi-stealth mechanics and wanted to try to recreate a similar experience myself. This is a relatively short game (approx. 5 mins) with only 3 levels, as I had to cut the scope quite heavily as the week went on - for example, there is no audio in the game.

Any feedback appreciated, if you have a game of your own please leave a comment so that I can check it out!

Cheers,

Jiminy Snicket
